import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { Bars3Icon, BellIcon, ChevronDownIcon, UserCircleIcon, Cog6ToothIcon, ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { clsx } from 'clsx'; const Header = ({ setSidebarOpen }) => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); }; return (
{/* Mobile menu button */} {/* Separator */}
{/* Search */}
{/* Notifications */} {/* Separator */}
{/* Profile dropdown */} Open user menu
{user?.full_name || user?.email} {({ active }) => ( Settings )} {({ active }) => ( )}
); }; export default Header;
